cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.SI. 

This paper deals with the problem of dynamically optimizing relevance feedback in a recommendation process, which is a common problem in machine learning and information retrieval. The paper uses a standard predictive model inspired by collaborative filtering, which is a popular technique in machine learning and recommender systems. The problem of optimizing relevance feedback is also related to the problem of maximizing user engagement, which is a common problem in human-computer interaction. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction), and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
